Generous Australian man hands out $100 cash to workers queuing outside Centrelink

https://t.co/e8RGa6uqWZ
                                                                               No-one has money to spare in these tough times, but that hasn't stopped an extraordinary act of generosity.

A cafe-owner who's business is in strife has handed out $100 notes to people queuing at Box Hill Centrelink. @MaggieRaworth #9News
